is-directory

Returns true if a filepath exists on the file system and it’s directory.

Install

Install with npm:

sh $ npm install is-directory --save

Usage

```js var isDirectory = require(‘is-directory’);

isDirectory(‘node_modules’, function(err, dir) { if (err) throw err; console.log(dir); //=> true });

isDirectory.sync(‘README.md’); //=> false ```
